reviewText: I am currently watching this movie on Netflix.  I love it.  I wish that it did not have to end--that it could have taken the life of the holy family and made it into a weekly series.  Instead of all the junk that is on TV these days, this would make a great and wholesome show for the entire family.

This is one of the best films I've seen made of Joseph and Mary. I loved the drama in this film. I saw it for the first time on Neflix and would love to buy the movie to make it part of my films collection. It is unfortunate that Amazon doesn't have it on stock. I will continue on my search until I find a copy somewhere. Beautiful movie in my opinion.
